TopicTitle: Any ways to edit the ksp soundtrack?

Articles.Content: I have some really nice ambient music that I want to be played in-game. How would I go about doing this?
I would be really neat if I could add my own music to the game...

Well, the fact that nobody has replied yet means that it's really difficult, if not impossible, to do so.

For some reason, it's like the devs didn't want us to add sounds to the game.

I would be really neat if I could add my own music to the game...

I always just took the stupid route by muting the game's music and running VLC in the background; that's not exactly an answer but it is a solution, depending on what's needed. ...Really I'm just curious what your music is. May have to add it to my playlist

I always just took the stupid route by muting the game's music and running VLC in the background; that's not exactly an answer but it is a solution, depending on what's needed. ...Really I'm just curious what your music is. May have to add it to my playlist

How is that "stupid"... it's pretty much the only way that makes any sense, I'd call it pragmatic. Computers can actually multitask, though fullscreen browsers may have caused some people to forget that

How is that "stupid"... it's pretty much the only way that makes any sense, I'd call it pragmatic. Computers can actually multitask, though fullscreen browsers may have caused some people to forget that

Thanks

Reminds me of the scene in Primer - "What is that saying about how the best mathematician is a lazy one?"

My list is all the expected stuff - Gustav Holst, plus the OSTs to Moon, Solaris, 2001, Gravity etc - but I've also got some Lights Out Asia. Randomly googling Arthur C. Clarke quotes I found out they'd made an album where the first three tracks were 'all these worlds are yours,' 'except europa' and 'attempt no landings there.'

"That's it, this is making the list - I don't even know what it sounds like yet, but I don't care."
I just find a 6 hour eve online soundtrack piece on youtube and have that run in the background.
